---
title: DICOM Tags
---


## General Tags

### Station Name (CT/MR Name)

`00081010` (0008,1010): **Station Name**

Example:

```js
"00081010": {
    "vr": "SH",
    "Value": [
        "AWP152068"
    ]
}
```

### Study Type

`00321060` (0032,1060): **Requested Procedure Description**

Example: 

```js
"00321060": {
    "vr": "LO",
    "Value": [
        "MRI Brain"
    ]
}
```

`00080104` (0008,0104): **Code Meaning**

Example: 

```js
"00080104": {
    "vr": "LO",
    "Value": [
        "MRI Brain"
    ]
},
```

### Series

`0008103E` (0008,103E): **Series Description**

Example: 

```js
"0008103E": {
    "vr": "LO",
    "Value": [
        "AX_T2FS_MV_XD"
    ]
}
```

### Protocol Name


`00181030` (0018,1030): **Protocol Name**

Example: 

```js
"00181030": {
    "vr": "LO",
    "Value": [
        "AX_T2FS_MV_XD"
    ]
}
```



## MRI Params


### Phase

`00089209` (0008,9209): **Acquisition Contrast**

Example: 

```js
"00089209": {
    "vr": "CS",
    "Value": [
        "T2"
    ]
},
```

### TR

`00180080` (0018, 0080): **Repetition Time**

Example: 

```js
"00180080": {
    "vr": "DS",
    "Value": [
        480
    ]
}
```

### TE

"00180081": {
    "vr": "DS",
    "Value": [
        8.9
    ]
},


### FA

"00181314": {
    "vr": "DS",
    "Value": [
        90
    ]
},
